name: Mimos or Suspiros de Moya

ingredients: Splash of lemon juice (1/8 of a lemon)

instructions: - Whip ingredients until it develops sharp peaks.
- Transfer to piping bag, make the shapes on an oven paper and bake for 1 h @90ÂºC.

serving: Serve shortly after baking or reheat in an oven because they will soak water from the air and turn gummy. Still good but it's not the same.
